conversation.speaker: mom
conversation.text:
おはよう！朝ごはんは食べた？
(Good morning! Did you eat breakfast?)

conversation.speaker: りきぞう
conversation.text:
おはよう、お母さん。まだだよ。
(Good morning, Mom. Not yet.)

conversation.speaker: mom
conversation.text:
冷蔵庫に卵があるから、食べてね。
(There are eggs in the fridge, so please eat.)

conversation.speaker: dad
conversation.text:
よう、元気か？
(Hey, how are you?)

conversation.speaker: りきぞう
conversation.text:
うん、元気だよ。お父さんは？
(Yeah, I'm good. How about you, Dad?)

conversation.speaker: dad
conversation.text:
まあまあだな。今日は何するんだ？
(Not bad. What are you doing today?)

conversation.speaker: りきぞう
conversation.text:
日本語を勉強するつもり。
(I'm planning to study Japanese.)

conversation.speaker: dad
conversation.text:
いいね！頑張れよ。
(Nice! Do your best.)
